items.sentence: Do you think Tom is ever going to get married?
Tom stopped me from doing what I wanted to do.
I stretch before exercising to prevent injury.
Tom studied electrical engineering in college.
You\'re the best thing that\'s happened to me.
You\'re the kind of person I\'d like to marry.
You\'re the one who gave me this, aren\'t you?
I\'m going to bake a cake for Tom\'s birthday.
I don\'t work as many hours a day as Tom does.
I like the name Tom. It has a nice ring to it.
Do you really think it\'ll be easy to do that?
Have you noticed anything out of the ordinary?
Have you reported that your father is missing?
Tom is rich, so money isn\'t really a problem.
I don\'t think Tom has time today to help you.
Tom asked me whether I wanted sugar in my tea.
Tom carries a harmonica with him all the time.
Tom carries a harmonica with him at all times.
Tom was released from the hospital last month.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to speak French.
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t like him very much.
Tom is starting to look a lot like his father.
Tom is taller than any other boy in his class.
Tom can\'t go to the art museum with us today.
You\'re only pretending to study, aren\'t you?
Tom didn\'t say when he was planning to leave.
I came out here to enjoy some peace and quiet.
I think something horrible is about to happen.
Tom has made some horrible decisions recently.
Tom has no idea when Mary plans on doing that.
Tom\'s been living in Boston since he was six.
Tom was sitting all by himself at the counter.
Tom was standing in front of the kitchen sink.
There are many Japanese restaurants in Boston.
You have to do everything Tom tells you to do.
Tom has admitted that he was there that night.
Tom made up his mind to become a newspaperman.
You can\'t be everyone\'s friend all the time.
I can stay with you as long as you want me to.
Both Tom and Mary will be busy this afternoon.
Can I go to Boston with you guys this weekend?
Can I rely on you to be here on time tomorrow?
Can someone please just tell us what happened?
I didn\'t expect anything like this to happen.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary about what had happened.
Tom has experienced many failed relationships.
You\'re almost young enough to be my daughter.
You\'re really talkative tonight, aren\'t you?
I\'m really sorry that I wasn\'t able to help.
No one knows exactly where Tom is going to go.
